divs: Sighting Detailswe were driving home in rome pa and i thought i saw 2 stars until i realized how bright they were and close together. i noticed it was moving and kinda low. it went over top of us and i looked under it. i could see a circle that was a lighter shade of black than the sky. it had two really dim red lights under it. i was very surpfised when i saw this and it was like it was trying not to be seen. we lost sight of it as it flew over us
Summary: 2 star-like bright lights with circular shape under it and 2 dim red lights.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rome
This sighting has never been favorited.
